metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0168 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A denial of service (DOS) issue was found in the Linux kernelâ€™ssmb2_ioctl_query_info function in the fs/cifs/smb2ops.c Common InternetFile System (CIFS) due to an incorrect return from the memdup_userfunction. This flaw allows a local, privileged (CAP_SYS_ADMIN) attacker tocrash the system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
